column4: Hi, I made a bootable USB live boot with Ubuntu 12.04. But when it starts on my PC, it says "vesamenu32 not a COM32r"
so I tried pressing TAB , and then type live and <ENTER>

Hi, I made a bootable USB live boot with Ubuntu 12.04. But when it starts on my PC, it says "vesamenu32 not a COM32r" .  so I tried pressing TAB , and then type live and <ENTER> .   but it says "could not find kernel image live"  . Any ideas how to fix?
- how did you make the usb live book, unetbootin is buggy try the ubuntu usbcreator it may rectify the way the live usb boot is made
